## The components {.smaller}

* Observation
    * Idea for hypothesis
* Induction
    * General rule
    * Hypothesis
* Deduction
    * Expectation / Prediction
    * Operationalization
* Testing
    * Test hypothesis
    * Compare data to prediction
* Evaluation
    * Interpret results in terms of hypothesis
